user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Multi-Factor Authentication and Secure Login
epics.summary: Implement user authentication with multi-factor security features.
epics.description: Develop a secure login module supporting multi-factor authentication through OTP, biometrics, or security tokens. Ensure encryption of credentials, session control, and automatic logout after inactivity. Include account recovery mechanisms and integrate with existing identity management systems to enhance overall portal security.

epics.title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Enable profile management and apply access restrictions by user role.
epics.description: Create user profile management capabilities allowing customers to view and update personal information. Implement role-based access control to restrict visibility and access to features based on the user’s privileges and authorization levels. Audit logs must capture all role changes and login activity for compliance monitoring.

epics.title: Responsive User Interface Design
epics.summary: Design a responsive UI framework across all devices.
epics.description: Develop an adaptive user interface compatible with desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports. Ensure a consistent user experience through optimized layouts, accessibility compliance, and touch-friendly interactions. Conduct usability testing to refine navigation, responsiveness, and overall ease of use.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard and Product Display
epics.summary: Build a dashboard tailored to each user's banking profile.
epics.description: Design a personalized dashboard that showcases the customer’s active accounts, eligible products, and available services. Use customer segmentation, profile data, and banking product rules to dynamically present relevant offerings. Include quick access to recent activities, balances, and next-step suggestions for product engagement.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement streamlined workflows for new accounts and service updates.
epics.description: Create guided workflows for users to initiate and complete applications for account openings or service modifications. Optimize workflows for minimal clicks and ensure pre-filled fields for existing data. Validate form inputs in real time, support form autosave functionality, and facilitate continuation of partially completed submissions.

epics.title: Document Upload and Application Continuation
epics.summary: Provide a secure mechanism for document uploads and resuming in-progress applications.
epics.description: Implement functionality allowing users to upload, preview, and manage supporting documentation directly from the portal. Ensure encryption during transit and at rest, with integrated virus scanning. Enable customers to save incomplete applications, resume them later, and retain previous inputs securely.

epics.title: Notifications and Real-Time Request Tracking
epics.summary: Deliver notifications and live status updates for user requests.
epics.description: Build a real-time notification engine that informs users via email and portal messages about the progression of their submitted requests. Implement a dedicated portal section for tracking request status, timestamps, and any additional actions required. Notifications should be configurable and automatically triggered based on status changes.

epics.title: Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Record and display a detailed history of user actions within the portal.
epics.description: Develop an audit and activity tracking system to capture every portal interaction — login activity, service requests, document uploads, and updates. Allow customers to review their own activity history while ensuring that detailed logs are stored securely for administrative and compliance audit purposes.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core systems.
epics.description: Build a middleware integration layer connecting the self-service portal with core banking systems in real time. Synchronize account data, eligibility checks, and product updates. Maintain a separate local database for caching and performance optimization while ensuring data consistency and integrity.

epics.title: Data Security, Compliance, and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Ensure data and system security while optimizing performance.
epics.description: Enforce robust data protection through encryption, secure API communication, and compliance with banking security frameworks such as PCI DSS and GDPR. Apply regular penetration tests, vulnerability scans, and performance benchmarking to guarantee reliability, scalability, and regulatory adherence across all modules.

user_stories.title: Secure login with multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in using multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure secure access to my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support for OTP, biometrics, and security tokens. Credentials must be encrypted.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can log in with multi-factor authentication, including OTP, biometrics, or tokens.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they log in, then they should complete multi-factor authentication to gain access.

user_stories.title: Automatic logout after inactivity
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the system to automatically log me out after inactivity, so that I can prevent unauthorized access to my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Automatic logout should occur after a predefined period of inactivity.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User is logged out automatically after inactivity period.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an inactive user session, when the inactivity period is reached, then the user should be logged out automatically.

user_stories.title: Integration with identity management systems
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to integrate multi-factor authentication with existing identity management systems, so that I can streamline user authentication.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Seamless integration with existing identity management systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Multi-factor authentication is integrated with current identity management systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the integration, when a user authenticates, then they should pass through the new multi-factor authentication process seamlessly.

user_stories.epic_title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Profile management for updating personal information
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to manage and update my personal information, so that I can keep my profile up-to-date.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Users must be able to view and edit personal information.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can view and update their personal information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they access the profile management section, then they should be able to view and update their personal information.

user_stories.epic_title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Role-based access control
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to implement role-based access control, so that I can restrict visibility and access based on user privileges.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must determine access privileges and visibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Access and visibility are governed by user roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user role, when accessing different sections, then permissions and visibility should align with the role's privileges.

user_stories.epic_title: User Profile and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Audit logs for role changes and login activity
user_stories.description: As a compliance officer, I want to monitor changes to user roles and login activities, so that I can ensure compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Audit logs must capture role changes and login details for compliance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Role changes and login activities are logged for compliance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a role change or login, when an event occurs, then it should be recorded in the audit logs.

user_stories.title: Adaptive UI for different devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive UI, so that I can have a consistent experience on any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: UI must adapt to desktop, tablet, and mobile viewports.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a device (desktop, tablet, mobile), when accessing the portal, then the UI should provide an optimal user experience.

user_stories.title: Accessibility compliance
user_stories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want an accessible UI, so that I can navigate the portal without barriers.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the need for accessibility, when navigating the portal, then the UI should comply with WCAG standards.

user_stories.title: Usability testing for UI refinement
user_stories.description: As a UX designer, I want to conduct usability testing, so that I can refine navigation and responsiveness.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Conduct usability tests to improve UI.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: UI refinements based on usability testing feedback.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user feedback, when usability tests are conducted, then navigation and responsiveness should be refined.

user_stories.title: Personalized dashboard for active accounts
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can see my active accounts and relevant offerings.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard displays active accounts and products based on customer profile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows active accounts and relevant products.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when accessing the dashboard, then it should display active accounts and tailored offerings.

user_stories.title: Quick access to recent activities and balances
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want quick access to my recent activities and balances, so that I can conveniently monitor my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard includes recent activities and current balances.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Recent activities and balances are displayed on the dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer, when viewing the dashboard, then recent activities and balances should be readily available.

user_stories.title: Next-step suggestions for product engagement
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want suggestions for next steps, so that I can engage with relevant products and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard offers next-step suggestions based on user profile.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard provides next-step suggestions for customer engagement.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a customer profile, when viewing the dashboard, then next-step suggestions should be displayed.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Guided workflows for account opening
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for account opening, so that I can easily complete the process.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should minimize clicks and provide pre-filled fields for existing data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can open accounts through a guided, efficient process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when starting an account opening workflow, then the process should be guided and user-friendly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service modification workflows
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify my services through guided workflows, so that I can update my account efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should support service updates with real-time validation and pre-filled data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can modify services through guided workflows.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when modifying services, then the process should be guided and efficient.

user_stories.title: Document upload functionality
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload documents securely, so that I can provide necessary supporting documentation.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support secure upload, preview, and management of documents with encryption during transit and at rest.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can securely upload and manage documents.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when uploading a document, then it should be securely transmitted and stored.

user_stories.title: Resume in-progress applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save incomplete applications and resume later, so that I can continue without starting over.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Support save functionality and secure resumption of incomplete applications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can save and resume incomplete applications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user logs back in, then they should be able to continue from where they left off.
